Animal Health Law 
Animal Welfare 
Zoos Directive

organisation_name: European Association of Zoo and Wildlife Veterinarians (EAZWV)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
EAZWV is member of:  
WAZA (World Association of Zoos and Aquariums) www.waza.org and  
IUCN (International Union for Conservation of Nature) www.iucn.org and the  
EAZA (European Association of Zoos and Aquariums), www.eaza.net and the  
American Association of Zoo Veterinarians (AAZV) www.aazv.org 
Wildlife Diease Association (WDA) and European Wildlife Diseaes Association (EWDA)
